name: ORSVC
short_description:
ORSimpleVideoConverter is a software package developed in Java language, to be used as a friendly front-end for the FFmpeg. This tool supports all major operating systems (OS), Windows, Linux and MacOSX. However, the FFmpeg binary distribution must be suitable for that OS. Thus, this tool can support a wide range of media formats and most of the features present in FFmpeg.

Requirements:
In order to use ORSimpleVideoConverter you must have installed a Java Runtime Environment 1.7 or later.

Features:
Supports hard/soft coded subtitles
Drag and Drop of multiple files
Conversion of multiple files simultaneously
Constant quality or average bitrate video encoding
summary: ORSimpleVideoConverter is a friendly front-end for FFmpeg
